title: MariaDB to PostgreSQL Migration
description: i need an experienced database administrator to migrate a database from mariadb to postgresql. requirements: - database size is less than 1gb. - all tables should be migrated equally; no special attention needed for specific tables. - it's crucial to maintain all specific data formats and constraints during the migration. ideal skills and experience: - proficiency in both mariadb and postgresql - strong understanding of database formats and constraints - proven experience with database migration projects - attention to detail to ensure data integrity

title: IETM Level 4 Development
description: develop a cutting-edge level 4 interactive electronic technical manual (ietm) for technical maintenance documentation (preventive, corrective, predictive). the solution must exceed standard s1000d/mil-std benchmarks and integrate next-gen features for global enterprises. interactive 3d models: explodable parts linked to procedures, with ar view (compatible with hololens/ios/android). animation support for complex assemblies (e.g., gearbox disassembly). ai-powered search: nlp-based semantic search (e.g., "overheating during startup" returns relevant diagnostics). voice command support (multilingual). smart troubleshooting: dynamic fault trees with probabilistic guidance (e.g., "based on 200+ cases, replace sensor x first"). integration with iot sensors for real-...

title: Cross-Platform Accounting App Development
description: i'm looking for an experienced mobile app developer to create a cross-platform accounting app. key requirements: - stable and user-friendly interface - secure login and data protection - basic accounting functions (income, expenses, reports) - budgeting tools - multi-currency support - sync across devices - push notifications for transactions ideal skills and experience: - expertise in react native or flutter - strong background in app security - experience with financial or accounting apps - ui/ux design skills - good communication and project management please provide examples of previous work and an estimated timeline. looking forward to your proposals!

title: SQL Server Optimization Expert Needed
description: i'm seeking a senior sql server dba to optimize our sql server environment. key tasks include: - optimizing specific stored procedures (documentation provided) - creating and implementing indexing strategies - partitioning databases for performance improvement ideal skills and experience: - extensive sql server experience - expertise in stored procedures, indexing, and partitioning - strong documentation and communication skills - familiarity with sql server optimization tools please provide examples of previous optimization work and relevant certifications.

title: AI Database for Cement & Materials

title: Supabase Database Schema Expert Needed
description: i'm seeking an experienced supabase professional to help fix, structure, and finalize key areas of my application. key tasks include: - fixing database configuration issues, primarily around database schema design. - restructuring table relationships to optimize performance and ensure data integrity. ideal skills and experience: - proficiency in supabase and postgresql - strong experience with database schema design and table relationships - ability to troubleshoot and resolve database configuration issues looking forward to your expertise!

title: PowerBI Reports Fix and Training
description: i'm looking for help fixing existing powerbi reports, and subsequent support to train a group of seven project managers (ideally on-site based in fareham, uk). the databases we're using are fairly large (based on ms project information for circa 50 projects uploaded to ms project server) and would ideally required an on-site presence in fareham, uk. requirements: - fix data inaccuracies in existing powerbi reports (reports not refreshing correctly) - debug charts and graphs visualizations - potential improvements to existing visualisations to support better quality decision making training: - train seven project managers on basic powerbi report creation using ms project server (cost/schedule) data. - ideal skills include powerbi expertise, debugging experience, and training c...

title: Cancer Charity Database Development
description: i need a comprehensive database for a cancer charity. the primary function of this database will be to track volunteers. key features needed: - volunteer management: - track contact details, availability, skills and qualifications, and tasks performed. - event organization: - organize fundraising events and volunteer training sessions. - patient management: storing their data and linking them to the volunteers assigned to perform tasks. ideal skills and experience: - experience in database design and management - familiarity with non-profit organization needs - ability to create user-friendly interfaces - strong organizational skills to handle multiple data points please provide examples of similar work done and your approach to ensure the database is secure and efficient.

title: Power BI Financial Dashboard
description: i need a power bi expert to create a financial metrics dashboard. the dashboard should visualize the following financial metrics: - revenue - expenses - profit & loss the data will be sourced from sql databases. ideal skills & experience: - proficiency in power bi - strong background in financial data analysis - experience connecting sql databases to power bi - ability to create interactive and insightful dashboards

title: Data Cleaning in Databricks Azure
description: i'm looking for an experienced data scientist to assist with data cleaning and preprocessing tasks using databricks. key requirements: - work with structured data, primarily from sql databases (mysql, postgresql). - clean and preprocess data to prepare it for analysis. - handle missing values, removing duplicates, normalization and scaling. ideal skills and experience: - proficiency in databricks. - strong sql skills and experience with mysql and postgresql. - expertise in data cleaning and preprocessing techniques. looking for someone who can efficiently handle large datasets and ensure data quality.

title: Scalable Data Pipeline Development

title: Database Developer/ Compiler needed
description: we are looking for a database developer/compiler who can help us develop and maintain our databases. the ideal candidate will have experience with both sql and nosql databases, and will be able to write efficient and reliable code. they will also be able to work with our team to ensure that our databases are up-to-date and meet our needs.
